snippet.title: Sonic: Fan Games/Hacks 416: Sonic Babies (SAGE2009)
snippet.description:
(These are my simple game play videos)
(I can and will remove specific videos if its necessary/requested)

Name: Sonic Babies - SAGE2009
Credit: Funstar Entertainment
Release Date: July 25th, 2009

My Website: https://scaleyfoxy.weebly.com/

Download: Only on Site.

00:00 - Logo
00:07 - Title
01:03 - Omochao Disaster
04:36 - All Doodled Up!
06:30 - Look Out!
07:57 - Carnival Panic
09:56 - Treasure Hunter
13:26 - Candy Frenzy
15:56 - Shoot 'Em!
17:27 - Treasure War
19:21 - Slide Fun!
20:56 - Slowly Now...

NOTES: OH BOY! Baby Sonic characters!
A week later... The day comes yet AGAIN! For babysitter Knuckles to bring
Sonic and his baby friends to the local Amusement Park!
But SUDDENLY they heard some EVIL PLAN coming from some stranger! OH NO!
The Babies now have to save their favorite local Amusement Park and THE WORLD before it's too late!
In their crazy adventures they go about clearing 10-Minigames and potential Events!
Such as throwing around an explosive Omochao! ALWAYS KNEW Omo was EVIL!
Drawing pictures together!
Avoiding a nasty arrow that tries to point their way!
Trying to dodge those nasty Carnival Springs!
Hunting some dangerous ruins for some SWEET TREASURE! With... falling rocks YIKES! NO PARK SAFETY!?
Hiding from Baby Sonic as he has for some reason turned on evereyone with a big cannon!
And Amy also turns on the rest and everyone has to avoid her!
Being on the beach for MORE treasure hunting competition!
Showing off who is the best jumper!
And finally... Sneaking up on that Eggy...
Truly a CRAZY 4-Player adventure!
Yes this game needs four people to play correctly... As it's a Party Game.
Overall I think it's innocent and neat for the most part.
I think there are some Events in the game but I'm not sure if they trigger or not.
There is however ONE...Issue this 2009 is a Demo... in SAGE2010 there was supposedly a Full 100MB game of this...
And I don't have it... So if anyone does let me know so it can be proper archived...

(TIPS)
Press "F1" for Help
Press "CTRL+Y" for Control Config
